title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
writer: Stephen Hillenburg (television series SpongeBob SquarePants), Stephen Hillenburg (story), Derek Drymon, Tim Hill, Stephen Hillenburg, Kent Osborne, Aaron Springer, Paul Tibbitt
actors: Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown, Rodger Bumpass, Bill Fagerbakke
plot: After King Neptune's crown is stolen, SpongeBob and Patrick go on a quest in 6 days to retrieve his crown. On the way SpongeBob and Patrick defeat many evildoers using their brains and bronzes. While this is happening someone is taking over Bikini Bottom and SpongeBob and Patrick must defeat this mastermind.
